page.title: 16THREE BOYS VIEWS OF 1985
page.content: PAUL HANNON The fashion of 1985 is probably the best of this century.The main fashion of this year is,farah trouser's,Adidas shoe's and pringle jumper's and Adidas tee shirts. CARL GALLACHER IN 1985 many things happened like the IRA bomb which destoryed the GRAND HOTAL in Brighton; but is very nice place to live in.The people in Brighton are very nice .I like living in Brighton because its very exciting. JASON MARCHANT Computers are the best form of imformation. Computers can help people learn Sometimes you can even enjoy yourself by playing games on them. You can even cummicate on them . Computers can be typewriters.
